title: loabiti33

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: You should add more details regarding this Job here, no need of taking things to telegram, if they are legit, you will see lots of people who will be willing to work with you, but expecting a telegram DM is a big error for members to do.Everything here is done, in a transparent way, so that both parties can get satisfied.

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: Before I even think of sending you a DM on telegram, can you tell me what kind of job is it?I have done data entry jobs before and I think you will ask for money before giving any work, if it's the same kind of work then I'm sorry I'm not interested. If not, send me a DM here with all the details of the work (if you don't want to disclose them here) and if I find it useful, I'll vouch for you here and also work with you.

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: i can do it but i don't use telegram.u can send me a pm here with the details.i allow newbies to send messages.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: loabiti33 on April 26, 2023, 12:48:00 PMRequire assistance on data entry (or form filling) and copy and paste some texts onlinePayment mainly in Eth or Btc or Usdt, amount depends on the chosen hours, contact telegram: Bibixblad3Would you like to share the detail of the project? What will be the payment terms? Is it an hourly project or a fixed-price project? Also, will you use escrow or you will send payment upfront? If you want to send it upfront or want to use escrow then send me a pm and I am able to work with you.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: Ever-young on April 26, 2023, 12:57:51 PMYou should add more details regarding this Job here, no need of taking things to telegram, if they are legit, you will see lots of people who will be willing to work with you, but expecting a telegram DM is a big error for members to do.Everything here is done, in a transparent way, so that both parties can get satisfied.With my experience on the Internet, and especially the offers that are published on the forum, it is most likely that any member with a new account who publishes an offer without providing details, referring to Telegram as a tool for communication, is necessarily a suspicious offer and the intentions of its owner are not legitimate.The subject begins with a seductive offer of simple tasks, then asks him to register on platforms or provide private data. These offers are like a trap, try as much as possible to know the guarantees before diving into it.Quote from: loabiti33 on April 26, 2023, 12:48:00 PMThanks for the help. Wish no troubles will happen if any!
